overview:
Peter is the President and COO of FiPath, formerly eRollover. He retired from Ameriprise Financial Advisors, Inc. (formerly American Express Financial Advisors), as a Senior Vice President following 25 years of building top performing organizations, including the development of a 5,000+ personal financial advisor network. Most recently he led the Employee Personal Financial Advisor Force for the eastern half of the U.S., and also maintained national responsibility for Field Leadership Development.

Throughout his career at Ameriprise, Peter demonstrated a high level of success at the practice, district, regional and national levels, and held national responsibility for field leadership development, achieving a decade of unprecedented success with the attraction, development, and retention of top leaders.

For the past five years, Peter has served the small business community as a consultant, advisor, and mentor, as the Founder and CEO of The Velardi Group, LLC, leading organizations through start-up, turnaround, re-alignment, acquisition, and divestiture. Clients have included Dinova, EarthClub, and eRollover.

Peter earned a Bachelor of Science degree in Business Administration from Boston University School of Management. He is a Certified Financial Planner, and holds active securities and insurance licenses.
